item.title: Adding costum items?
item.dc:creator: @I_C_E I C E
item.description:
@I_C_E wrote:

I searched but never found a good tut so please explain for me.
I got the 2.dat files, the .jpg file and a file called Class8.java.info containing this information:

if(i == 7960) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = [Ljava.lang.String;@1e57c25; class8.anInt174 = 50000; class8.anInt181 = 2000; class8.anInt190 = 572; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 25; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 50001; class8.anInt200 = 50001; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Dragon Crossbow"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A powerfull and rare crossbow".getBytes(); }
